00012 #ifndef ASCII_IF_H_

00015 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00016  * ASCII datafile output interface class implementation. Creates a datafile  *
00017  * where each row represents an event.                                       *
00018  *                                                                           *
00019  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00020 
00021 #include <fstream>
00022 #include <Camgen/if_output.h>
00023 
00024 namespace Camorra
00025 {
00027     
00028     template<class model_t>class ascii_file: public interface_output<model_t>
00029     {
00030         typedef interface_output<model_t> base_type;
00031 
00032         public:
00033 
00034             /* Type definitions: */
00035 
00036             typedef model_t model_type;
00037             typedef typename model_type::value_type value_type;
00038             typedef vector<value_type,model_t::dimension> momentum_type;
00039             typedef typename std::vector<value_type>::iterator weight_iterator;
00040             typedef typename std::vector<value_type>::const_iterator const_weight_iterator;
00041             
00042             typedef typename std::map<std::string,const momentum_type*>::iterator vector_iterator;
00043             typedef typename std::map<std::string,const value_type*>::iterator value_iterator;
00044             typedef typename std::map<std::string,const int*>::iterator integer_iterator;
00045             typedef typename std::map<std::string,const bool*>::iterator boolean_iterator;
00046 
00047             /* Constructor with file name argument */
00048 
00049             ascii_file(const std::string& file_name_):base_type(file_name_),status(0){}
00050 
00051             /* Constructor with file name, tree name and tree description arguments: */
00052 
00053             ascii_file(const std::string& file_name_,const std::string description_):base_type(file_name_,description_),status(0){}
00054 
00055             /* Destructor: */
00056 
00057             ~ascii_file(){}
00058 
00059             /* Creation method implementation: */
00060 
00061             interface_output<model_t>* create(const std::string& file_name_) const
00062             {
00063                 return new ascii_file<model_t>(file_name_,this->description);
00064             }
00065 
00066             /* Opens the (temporary) datafile. */
00067 
00068             bool open_file()
00069             {
00070                 std::string fname=this->file_name+".tmp";
00071                 ofs.open(fname.c_str());
00072                 if(ofs.is_open())
00073                 {
00074                     status=1;
00075                     return true;
00076                 }
00077                 return false;
00078             }
00079 
00080             /* Closes the datafile. */
00081 
00082             bool close_file()
00083             {
00084                 if(status==2)
00085                 {
00086                     std::ofstream os;
00087                     os.open((this->file_name+".dat").c_str());
00088                     std::ifstream is;
00089                     is.open((this->file_name+".tmp").c_str());
00090                     std::string line;
00091                     std::getline(is,line);
00092                     os<<line<<std::endl<<std::endl;
00093                     do
00094                     {
00095                         std::getline(is,line);
00096                         os<<line<<std::endl;
00097                     }
00098                     while(!is.eof());
00099                     is.close();
00100                     os.close();
00101                 }
00102                 if(ofs.is_open())
00103                 {
00104                     ofs.close();
00105                 }
00106                 status=0;
00107                 std::remove((this->file_name+".tmp").c_str());
00108                 return true;
00109             }
00110 
00111             /* Virtual method adding a branch holding a Lorentz vector: */
00112 
00113             bool branch(const momentum_type* p,const std::string& varname)
00114             {
00115                 if(status<2)
00116                 {
00117                     vectors[varname]=p;
00118                     values.erase(varname);
00119                     integers.erase(varname);
00120                     booleans.erase(varname);
00121                     return true;
00122                 }
00123                 return false;
00124             }
00125 
00126             /* Virtual method adding a branch holding a floating-point number:
00127              * */
00128 
00129             bool branch(const value_type* x,const std::string& varname)
00130             {
00131                 if(status<2)
00132                 {
00133                     vectors.erase(varname);
00134                     values[varname]=x;
00135                     integers.erase(varname);
00136                     booleans.erase(varname);
00137                     return true;
00138                 }
00139                 return false;
00140             }
00141 
00142             /* Virtual method adding a branch holding an integer. */
00143 
00144             bool branch(const int* n,const std::string& varname)
00145             {
00146                 if(status<2)
00147                 {
00148                     vectors.erase(varname);
00149                     values.erase(varname);
00150                     integers[varname]=n;
00151                     booleans.erase(varname);
00152                     return true;
00153                 }
00154                 return false;
00155             }
00156 
00157             /* Virtual method adding a branch holding a boolean. */
00158 
00159             bool branch(const bool* b,const std::string& varname)
00160             {
00161                 if(status<2)
00162                 {
00163                     vectors.erase(varname);
00164                     values.erase(varname);
00165                     integers.erase(varname);
00166                     booleans[varname]=b;
00167                     return true;
00168                 }
00169                 return false;
00170             }
00171             
00172             /* Copies all values between the iterators to an extra weight branch. */
00173 
00174             bool insert_weight_branch(const_weight_iterator first,const_weight_iterator last,const std::string& varname)
00175             {
00176                 if(status<2)
00177                 {
00178                     return false;
00179                 }
00180                 std::ofstream os;
00181                 os.open((this->file_name+".dat").c_str());
00182                 std::ifstream is;
00183                 is.open((this->file_name+".tmp").c_str());
00184                 std::string line;
00185                 std::getline(is,line);
00186                 os<<line<<std::setw(20)<<varname<<std::endl<<std::endl;
00187                 const_weight_iterator it=first;
00188                 do
00189                 {
00190                     std::getline(is,line);
00191                     os<<line<<std::setw(20)<<*it<<std::endl;
00192                     ++it;
00193                 }
00194                 while(!is.eof() and it!=last);
00195                 is.close();
00196                 os.close();
00197                 status=3;
00198                 return true;
00199             }
00200 
00201             /* Writes the event to the output file. */
00202 
00203             bool write_event()
00204             {
00205                 if(status==0)
00206                 {
00207                     return false;
00208                 }
00209                 if(status==1)
00210                 {
00211                     ofs<<'#';
00212                     for(vector_iterator it=vectors.begin();it!=vectors.end();++it)
00213                     {
00214                         for(typename momentum_type::size_type i=0;i<model_type::dimension;++i)
00215                         {
00216                             std::stringstream ss;
00217                             ss<<it->first<<'['<<i<<']';
00218                             ofs<<std::setw(20)<<ss.str();
00219                         }
00220                     }
00221                     for(value_iterator it=values.begin();it!=values.end();++it)
00222                     {
00223                         ofs<<std::setw(20)<<it->first;
00224                     }
00225                     for(integer_iterator it=integers.begin();it!=integers.end();++it)
00226                     {
00227                         ofs<<std::setw(10)<<it->first;
00228                     }
00229                     for(boolean_iterator it=booleans.begin();it!=booleans.end();++it)
00230                     {
00231                         ofs<<std::setw(10)<<it->first;
00232                     }
00233                     ofs<<std::endl;
00234                 }
00235                 status=2;
00236                 for(vector_iterator it=vectors.begin();it!=vectors.end();++it)
00237                 {
00238                     for(typename momentum_type::size_type i=0;i<model_type::dimension;++i)
00239                     {
00240                         ofs<<std::setw(20)<<(*(it->second))[i];
00241                     }
00242                 }
00243                 for(value_iterator it=values.begin();it!=values.end();++it)
00244                 {
00245                     ofs<<std::setw(20)<<*(it->second);
00246                 }
00247                 for(integer_iterator it=integers.begin();it!=integers.end();++it)
00248                 {
00249                     ofs<<std::setw(10)<<*(it->second);
00250                 }
00251                 for(boolean_iterator it=booleans.begin();it!=booleans.end();++it)
00252                 {
00253                     ofs<<std::setw(10)<<*(it->second);
00254                 }
00255                 ofs<<std::endl;
00256             }
00257 
00258         private:
00259 
00260             std::ofstream ofs;
00261 
00262             int status;
00263 
00264             std::map<std::string,const momentum_type*> vectors;
00265             std::map<std::string,const value_type*> values;
00266             std::map<std::string,const int*> integers;
00267             std::map<std::string,const bool*> booleans;
00268     };
00269 }
00270 
00271 #endif /*ASCII_IF_H_*/
